short_summary: Mechanical Refrigeration and Salad Bar Equipment
description: The Department of National Defence (DND), Garrison Petawawa, has a requirement to procure a supply and delivery of a complete mechanically refrigerated salad bar cabinet unit at Normandy Kitchen, Garrison Petawawa.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: Mechanically Refrigerated Salad and Dessert Bar

### Brief Description

A response to this solicitation is not open for this tender announcement as it has been cancelled.

### Contract Information

* **Contract Title (English/French):** Mechanically Refrigerated Salad and Dessert Bar Request for Proposal / Demande de propositions pour un Buffet à salades et à desserts réfrigéré mécaniquement
* **RFP Reference Number (English/French):** WS3855564950 / WS3855564950
* **Date of Publication:** February 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery:** Petawawa
* **Contract Period:** Not Previously Specified

### Evaluation Criteria

* The bid will be evaluated on a combined rating of technical merit and price

### Important Dates

* Bid due date: February 21, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

Note to Bidders: Failure to meet the submission deadline will result in non-responsiveness.

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Darlene Keenan
* Contact Email: darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15305592](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15305592)
* URL of Contract Tender Documents: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15305592](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15305592)
